ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will cause you to recite so that you do not forget -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We shall make you recite (the Qur'an) so that you will not forget it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We shall make you recite and then you will not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall teach you (the Quran) and you will not forget it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We shall now make you read (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), so you will not forget.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We shall make you recite, so you shall not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We will make you recite so you shall not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We shall make thee recite, to forget not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We shall make thee read (O Muhammad) so that thou shalt not forget
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [O Prophet!] We shall make you recite the Quran so that you will not forget any of it --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We shall enable thee to recite, and then thou shalt not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We shall have you recite [the Quran], then you will not forget [any of it]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By degrees shall We teach thee to declare (the Message), so thou shalt not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We shall make you to recite (the Quran), so you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) shall not forget (it),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We shall make you recite so that you will not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We will make you read, so do not forget.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:6] We will have you recite, the Qur’ān, so that you will not forget, what you recite,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We shall make thee read (0 Muhammad)) We shall teach, Muhammad, the Qur'an; it is also said this means: Gabriel shall read to you the Qur'an (so that thou shalt not forget
